hero.name: Albert A. Dias
hero.headline: Senior Developer Analyst - React, React Native and NodeJS
hero.description: Senior Developer Analyst with over 10 years of experience in mobile and web development. Specialized in React, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js, working on medium and large-scale projects for companies like Volvo, Sicredi, Caixa Cons贸rcio, and Natura & Co.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Senior Developer Analyst with over 10 years of experience in mobile and web development. Specialized in React, React Native, TypeScript, and Node.js, working on medium and large-scale projects for companies like Volvo, Sicredi, Caixa Cons贸rcio, and Natura & Co.
about.passion: I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive solutions. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

current.description: Working on mobile app development with React Native, creating sales modules and portals, and maintaining existing applications. Continuous support to the team to ensure timely deliveries with high quality standards. Worked with clients like Volvo, Sicredi, and currently allocated to the Caixa Cons贸rcio team.

previous.description: Development of benefits club applications, integrations with private SSOs, Google Maps, check-ins by geolocation, working with a whitelabel for more than 100 applications. CI/CD of these applications.

previous.highlight2: Integrations with private SSOs and Google Maps

compass.description: Development of new features for Natura & Co client, focusing on the financial module of the web application and mobile app, ensuring performance, usability, and code maintenance.

compass.highlight2: Development of features for thousands of users

corpstek.description: Working on mobile app and website development, with participation in DevOps activities using AWS and Node.js. Technical leadership of a team with 6 developers, promoting best practices, technical alignment, and high-quality deliveries.

corpstek.highlight3: Promoting best practices and technical alignment

freelancer.description: Development of management systems for different segments, such as gyms, car washes, and snack bars. Creation of institutional websites and custom systems, with focus on process automation and user experience.

info.title: Let's work together
info.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to collaborate!
